attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown was a awful Chancellor, and is proving to be an even worse Prime Minister.  He has got this Country into a finanical mess with his excessive borrowing and over taxing of ALL classes, particularly low income families.  

Gordon Brown should hold a general election NOW, as he should never have been allowed to take the position of Prime Minister without the consensus of the public.  If he had held an electon he would not be in power today. Is he too scared of the public vote?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
